description.narrative: The Sri Lanka Nutrition Design initiative follows analysis of the nutrition situation in Sri Lanka, including the 2010 report produced by the World Bank on interventions in the rural and estate sectors and the Health Resource Facility situation analysis of 2012. Funding under this initiative will support: design work and the engagement of nutrition specialists to update the 2012 Situation Analysis Towards a Better Understanding of Under-Nutrition in Sri Lanka; assist AusAID reach agreement on potential options for scaling up nutrition assistance; and assist program staff complete an Investment Concept Summary based on agreed areas of support. The total value of this initiative is $0.2 million to be expensed during the 2013-14 financial year.
